entry.title: Scaling Bitcoin conference micro-report
entry.summary: The conversation in question has been deemed off-topic, but the disagreement being discussed is actually a fundamental decision that impacts all other development decisions. The debate centers around whether to focus on HideCoin or PopCoin, with no clear resolution in sight. This disagreement directly affects the block limit debate and without a resolution, Bitcoin lacks direction and developers are unable to make effective decisions. Although it's unlikely that this discussion will result in a resolution, it's important for people to understand the root of the problem.
